perks.description:
Throwing a grenade or hitting a target with a charged melee grants a stacking bonus to weapon stability, handling, and range.

Using a Super grants maximum stacks.
perks.name: Well-Rounded

perks.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.
perks.name: Auto-Loading Holster

perks.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a short duration.
perks.name: Steady Hands

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon increase accuracy and stability while improving vertical recoil.
perks.name: Heating Up

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for a moderate duration.
perks.name: Stats for All

perks.description: Picking up Heavy ammo also grants ammo to this weapon.
perks.name: Lead from Gold

perks.description: Each rapid kill with this weapon progressively increases reload speed for a short time.
perks.name: Feeding Frenzy

perks.description: Improved stability and accuracy as the magazine gets lower.
perks.name: Under Pressure

perks.description: Improved handling and reload speed when allies are nearby.
perks.name: Ensemble

perks.description: Grants increased reload speed when close to full magazine.
perks.name: Compulsive Reloader

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion.
perks.name: Perpetual Motion

perks.description: Increased ammo reserves. Faster reload, stow, and ready when you're crouching.
perks.name: Field Prep

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon grant bonus damage. While this buff is active, grenade or melee kills of the same damage type greatly increase its damage and duration.
perks.name: Golden Tricorn

perks.description: Direct hits with the top half of the magazine cause a detonation that slows nearby targets.
perks.name: Chill Clip

perks.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon until you are out of combat.
perks.name: Frenzy

perks.description: Faster time to aim down sights.
perks.name: Snapshot Sights

perks.name: Wellspring

perks.description: Faster charge time or draw time when surrounded by combatants.
perks.name: Cornered

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed.
perks.name: Successful Warm-Up

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one kill.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for a short duration.
perks.name: Harmony

perks.description: Killing combatants with this weapon generates a small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh

perks.description: Grants increased reload speed when out of combat.
perks.name: One Quiet Moment
